nodes.text: Sarrish was a planet in the Vensensor sector, and homeworld of the Sarrish people.
This planet was recognizable for its orbiting chain of pearl-like moons, which were clearly visible in the night sky. It was a rocky world covered in craters, promontories, and plateaus.
C'airam's cantina was located on Sarrish.
The planet was protected by the Sarrish Defense Force.

During the Clone Wars, the planet and the sector were represented in the Galactic Senate by Veedaaz Awmetth, a Sarrish native. During the Outer Rim Sieges, Sarrish was a Separatist stronghold and the site of the Battle of Sarrish which resulted in a Confederate victory.

In 4 ABY, this planet was the site of the gambler Drawmas Sma'Da's capture at the hands of the bounty hunters Zuckuss and 4-LOM. Shortly thereafter, it would also become the scene of Manaroo's successful wager with Sma'Da over the survival of her fiancee, Dengar.
